function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collaboration may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases due to close contact","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among collaborating individuals","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols during collaborative activities","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices","People":"Researchers, collaborators, and staff involved in collaborative activities","Owner":"Research institutions, conference organizers"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency and reproducibility in research practices may lead to misinformation about disease management","Impact":"Misinformation could lead to ineffective disease management strategies","Mitigation":"Promote transparency and reproducibility in research practices","Technologies":"Open-access databases, peer review platforms","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and the public","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Imbalance between research coverage of severe problems and 'low-hanging fruits' may lead to inadequate understanding of disease challenges","Impact":"Inadequate representation of real-world disease problems in research","Mitigation":"Encourage research prioritization based on real-world disease challenges","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, disease surveillance systems","People":"Researchers, funding agencies, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and governing bodies"}]}
